item.title: Trump 2nd term live updates: After Musk X post, director brings CFPB to standstill
item.description: President Donald Trump has begun his second administration with a series of controversial moves and decisions.

item.title: NGOs, nonprofits say US humanitarian aid has ground to complete halt worldwide
item.description: International aid and development work funded by the U.S. government has almost entirely come to a halt, leaders in humanitarian aid confirmed to ABC ...

item.title: 7.6 magnitude earthquake shakes the Caribbean southwest of Cayman Islands, USGS says
item.description: Some islands and countries urged people near the coastline to move inland in case of a tsunami.

item.title: WATCH: All eyes on the ads
item.description: ABC News' Will Ganss takes a look at how much companies are paying to be a part of the Super Bowl.

item.title: WATCH: Deserving superfans surprised with tickets to Super Bowl
item.description: “GMA” surprised Toya Mathis, a colon cancer survivor and now volunteer with the American Cancer Society, with tickets to Super Bowl LIX.
